description.value:
Fear

Aura 5

Any enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes a -5 penalty to damage rolls and grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

Aura 5

Codricuhn deals 10 damage to any enemy that ends its turn within the aura and slides that enemy 3 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+32 vs AC; 1d8+9 damage, and the target is grabbed.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Codricuhn makes two ensnaring chain attacks

At-Will

Minor, At-Will

Reach 4

Targets all creatures grabbed by Codricuhn; +31 vs Fortitude; 4d6+9 damage, and Codricuhn slides the target 5 squares and is no longer grabbing the target.

At-Will ✦ Lightning

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 2

Trigger: When a creature within codricuhn's line of sight is the target of a healing power, at-will

Targets enemies; +31 vs Reflex; 3d8+8 lightning damage, and Codricuhn slides the target 3 squares.

Encounter

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +31 vs Fortitude; 1d6+8 damage, and ongoing 20 damage (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is stunned (save ends).

Encounter

Standard

+31 vs Reflex; 2d8+9 damage, and the target falls prone and is grabbed.

At-Will ✦ Thunder

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Area burst 1 within 10

+31 vs Fortitude; 2d6+9 thunder damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Trigger: When first bloodied

Codricuhn gains an action point.
Codricuhn can squeeze through spaces as though he were a Large creature.

HP 1024; Bloodied 512
Resist 30 thunder, 10 variable (3/encounter) Immune gaze 		Init +21 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 41Fort 41Ref 39Will 37
Speed 5, climb 5 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 28 (+22)
Con 32 (+24)		Dex 26 (+21)
Int 10 (+13)		Wis 24 (+20)
Cha 29 (+22)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Primordial
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Athletics +27, Endurance +29, Intimidate +27Senses ; tremorsense 20,Truesight 10
Passive Perception 30 | Insight 30
